#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	long long n, m, a, temp, foo, foo1;
	
	scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&n,&m,&a);
	
	if(n%a==0)
	temp=0;
	else
	temp=1;
	
	foo=n/a+temp;
	m-=a;
	
	if(m%a == 0)
	temp=0;
	else
	temp=1;
	
	foo1=foo*(m/a + temp);
	
	printf("%lld\n",foo+foo1);
}
